most_active_tickets.title: Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
Pieces OS is not running even after several attempts and reinstallation
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks

common_issues.title: Workstream/Copilot Issues on MacOS with Pieces 4.2.1
common_issues.description: Users on MacOS with Pieces 4.2.1 are experiencing issues with Workstream and Copilot functionalities. Workstream is failing to update past activities, while Copilot struggles to retrieve data from Workstream, especially when dealing with multiple activities or specific time ranges.  Further investigation is needed to pinpoint the root cause and provide a solution.

related_issues.title: Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
related_issues.text:
Workstream activity can't update last week tasks
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I opened #753.
Now, Today's workstream is being updated but still I can't update last week activities with refresh button(select last week)

Is it good to think I can't revive last week tasks or I will be fixed?

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e177dccd-caea-46b9-bdbb-d3f4e88bfc84)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/91b7556d-d795-4e3d-8396-3b81cda2770d)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
related_issues.text:
Copilot doesn't use workstream activities properly.(It can't find data)
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

4.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Last week, I used the copilot for creating report of the day's work logs.
It worked properly but I doesn't work since yesterday(I don't know the issue starts from yesterday but I detected it on yesterday)

Copliot can't find the activities in workstream and It doesn't care about time range selection.

It works when using 'start copilot chat' button in specific activity, but can't use with multiple activities.

I hope to use it for creating daily work report everyday.

- requested today's daily work report
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fb4e4763-8866-432f-9ce5-12b4a0b4eead)
- requested today's daily work report using english
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/e11a9ed2-2714-4f2b-8d6b-c3272dccafbd)
- showing that I have acitivities
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c27034e-0640-45b5-8da8-83e715b95e5e)
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

related_issues.title: Pieces OS is not running even after several attempts and reinstallation
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS is not running even after several attempts and reinstallation
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/eef39ab8-c92c-46d6-bb74-233b3145acd9)

### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.0.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

i have tried several times to start the Pieces OS but it is not running even after several attempts and reinstallation
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate Workstream/Copilot integration issues on MacOS with Pieces 4.2.1, particularly focusing on data retrieval and activity updates. Prioritize resolving issue #765 (Copilot data retrieval) due to high activity level.
Address Pieces OS startup failure on Windows reported in issue #766. Ensure OS stability across different operating systems.
Improve Workstream activity update functionality, especially for past tasks (issue #763).
Monitor incoming tickets for similar patterns and proactively address potential widespread issues.
